fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Choose a player during the day to plunder, that player will be given a menu of three options (Sidestep, Chainmail, Backpedal.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You will attack your target with a basic attack no matter what.

Winning the duel will give all members of the  **Crew** detection immunity for that night, and upgrade the attack to Powerful for that kill alone.

You will super role-block your target, preventing **Transporters**,  **Escorts**, **Consorts**, **Necromancers**, **Retributionists**, and **Serial Killers** from using their ability past their immunity to roleblock.

If you die, a member of the crew will become the next **Pirate** to take your place.
